HOME.LOCATION_ENABLE: Please enable location in your browser accessibility settings
HOME.LOCATION_SAFE: Your location will never be given away
HOME.LOCATION_BROWSER: Your browser does not support geolocation
HOME.LOCATION_ERROR: Something went wrong with getting your location
HOME.LOCATION_CREATE: Enable browser location to create a spot or add comments
HOME.LOCATION_REQUIRED: Your location is needed to create Spots
HOME.LOCATION_REQUIRED_CREATE_1: Your location is required to view
HOME.LOCATION_REQUIRED_CREATE_2: spots, create new spots and to add comments

HOME.NO_POSTS: There are no Spots in this area
HOME.FIRST_POST_2: to make a spot in this area
HOME.VERIFY: You must verify your email before you can make spots
HOME.NO_EMAIL: You must add and verify an email before you can make spots

ACCOUNT.NO_ACCOUNT: No account. Please login to continue
ACCOUNT.GUEST: You are logged in on a guest account. You will not be able to update any account information.
ACCOUNT.NO_EMAIL: Please add an email to your account
ACCOUNT.EMAIL_VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: You will need to verify your email to start making spots.
ACCOUNT.FACEBOOK_DESCRIPTION: Connect with facebook to share spots with all your facebook friends

ACCOUNT_EDIT.TITLE: Edit Account
ACCOUNT_EDIT.PHONE_CONFIRM: You can only change your phone once every 24 hours. Are you sure you would like to continue?
ACCOUNT_EDIT.USERNAME_CONFIRM: You can only change your username once every 24 hours. Are you sure you would like to continue?
ACCOUNT_EDIT.EMAIL_CONFIRM: If you change your email you will need to verify your email again. Are you sure you would like to continue?

CREATE.ERROR_LINE_LENGTH: Your spot must be less than %LENGTH% lines

CREATE.ERROR_MAX_CONTENT: Spot must be less than %MAX% characters

POST_DETAILED.NO_POST: No post found with this link

COMMENTS_CONTAINER.ERROR_MIN_CONTENT: Comment must be greater than %MIN% characters
COMMENTS_CONTAINER.ERROR_MAX_CONTENT: Comment must be less than %MAX% characters

COMMENTS.ERROR_NO_CONTENT: Your reply must have a tag, text, or image

REPLY.ERROR_MAX_CONTENT: Reply must be less than %MAX% characters

CHAT_MENU.ADD_ROOMS: Join rooms to chat with those around you

CHAT_CREATE.TITLE: Create a room

ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity
ACTIVITY.NO_POST_ACTIVITY: You have no spots in recent activity
ACTIVITY.NO_POST_TIME: Activity is only shown for the last 72 hours
ACTIVITY.NO_COMMENT_ACTIVITY: You have no comments or replies in recent activity
ACTIVITY.NO_COMMENT_TIME: Activity is only shown for the last 72 hours

REPORT.REPORT_PLACEHOLDER: What would you like to report?
REPORT.OFFENSIVE: Offsensive language, harrassment or negative conduct
REPORT.HATE: Racism, sexism, homophobia, or any other hate speech

WELCOME.TITLE: Welcome
WELCOME.HEADING: Heading 1
WELCOME.ANONYMOUS_TEXT_1: Have an anonymous identity for each spot
WELCOME.FRIENDS_TEXT_2: Tag friends by commenting @name to share your identity
WELCOME.FRIENDS_TEXT_3: Get tagged back to be anonymous together
WELCOME.LOCATION_TEXT_1_2: to see spots in your area

VERIFY.FAILURE: There was an error verifying your email. Your verification code is either invalid or expired

UPLOAD_PHOTO.TITLE: Upload a photo
UPLOAD_PHOTO.DESCRIPTION_PP_1: A profile picture helps others recgonize you.
UPLOAD_PHOTO.DESCRIPTION_PP_2: Your picture will only be shown to the sepcific users you tag in comments and chats.
UPLOAD_PHOTO.DESCRIPTION_PP_3: You will always be anonymous to all other users.
UPLOAD_PHOTO.DESCRIPTION_CC_1: Add a photo to make your chat recgonizable.
UPLOAD_PHOTO.DESCRIPTION_CC_2: You can add or change a photo at any time.

UPLOAD_PHOTO.ERROR_REMOVING: There was an error removing your image, please try again.
